name: Bodyport
headline: Predicting and preventing heart disease.
description:
Bodyport’s cardiovascular sensing weight scale and predictive algorithms detect early changes in cardiac function to help prevent avoidable hospitalizations. Bodyport is initially targeting heart failure, a chronic condition affecting over 6M Americans and a leading cause of hospitalizations (1M/year) and healthcare spending ($35B/year).

Bodyport’s novel scale measures cardiac output, congestion, heart rate, and other leading indicators of cardiovascular health — all in the same step patients already take to weigh themselves. Companion algorithms and software empower care teams to quickly identify at-risk patients and remotely optimize their therapy to prevent deterioration.

founders.name: Corey Centen, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Biomedical engineer developing medical devices to improve cardiac health.

## One simple step tocare for your heart
# Introducing Bodyport
We are a biomarker-guided digital therapeutics company that aims to address complex chronic conditions by embedding a sophisticated biomarker platform into simple, easy-to-use devices. With one simple step, every person can access comprehensive health insights in their own home. Now patients and their care teams can better predict, understand, and intervene in worsening health to prevent hospitalizations and improve quality of life.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6725610025ff4e4cd5308766/672810a4cb3ef1db5d80876b_Bodyport_Logotype_cropped.png)
At Bodyport, we put the patient at the center of all we do — transforming the way heart disease is managed.
# Bodyport for Heart Health
Introducing the first, and only, fully integrated solution designed to simplify and improve heart disease management by way of a novel, noninvasive biomarker platform built into a simple and easy-to-use scale. But it’s so much more than that.
Bodyport for Heart Health integrates a robust clinical dashboard and personalized patient experience, giving both patients and their care teams comprehensive, actionable health insights—when and where they’re needed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6725610025ff4e4cd5308766/6727f4f8a740db51da7bcfda_HIPAA-logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6725610025ff4e4cd5308766/6727f4f8876a9124f9a241a4_SOC-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6725610025ff4e4cd5308766/67280cb1038347d2d75725c8_clinical-dashboard%402x.png)
# Simple design, big impact
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6725610025ff4e4cd5308766/6727f71b7344b7e75189539e_scale-dark-bg.png)
# Easy-to-use cardiac scale
With one simple step, the Bodyport Cardiac Scale detects signals through a person’s feet and sends data to the clinical care team in seconds. Advanced sensors and proprietary algorithms noninvasively measure a broad spectrum of hemodynamic biomarkers to assess heart function and fluid status.
## Fully-integrated solution with powerful insights to improve patient care
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6725610025ff4e4cd5308766/6727fcc71189a5d1e303d4ca_graph-a.svg)
## Hemodynamic biomarker platform 
The new Bodyport Congestion Index — a measure of fluid status — and key biomarkers on heart function augment weight tracking and patient symptoms for a holistic, personalized assessment rich with context.
## Simple, at-home experience
The novel biomarker platform detects hemodynamic signals through the feet in less than 30 seconds —making daily monitoring as simple and easy as stepping on what looks like a familiar, at-home scale.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6725610025ff4e4cd5308766/67280106c84018d92c5cb9b8_graph-b.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6725610025ff4e4cd5308766/672801321189a5d1e30717cc_graph-c.svg)
## Timely, effective interventions
Clinical care teams receive alerts and insights on patient status to triage support and take timely action. In addition, our personalized patient experience improves engagement and outcomes.

generated_description:
**Bodyport: Transforming Heart Health with Innovation**

Bodyport is a cutting-edge company on a mission to predict and prevent heart disease. Launched in 2015 as part of Y Combinator's S15 batch, this San Francisco-based firm has set its sights on addressing one of healthcare's most pressing issues—heart failure, which impacts over six million Americans and leads to around one million hospitalizations annually.

### What Makes Bodyport Unique?

At the heart of Bodyport’s innovation is its cardiovascular sensing weight scale, equipped with predictive algorithms that detect early changes in cardiac function. This allows healthcare practitioners to intervene before conditions worsen, significantly potentially reducing avoidable hospitalizations.

The Bodyport scale is not just a scale; it’s a comprehensive health monitoring device that measures key indicators of cardiovascular health—including cardiac output, congestion, and heart rate—all in a familiar, user-friendly format. Imagine stepping onto a scale and not just seeing your weight, but also receiving critical insights about your heart health in a matter of seconds.

### Why Focus on Heart Disease?

Heart failure is a chronic condition that places a hefty burden on the healthcare system, costing around $35 billion yearly. Bodyport's solution addresses this by empowering care teams with actionable data, enabling timely interventions that can improve patient outcomes and quality of life. 

Their approach combines advanced sensor technology with proprietary algorithms to provide a holistic view of heart health, making it easier for both patients and providers to make informed decisions. The benefit? A streamlined experience that seamlessly integrates into patients' daily lives and provides direct feedback to their healthcare teams.

### The Team and Their Future

With a dedicated team of 19 and support from knowledgeable partners, Bodyport is poised for significant growth. They aim not just to enhance heart disease management but to revolutionize it by making healthcare more accessible and predictive through technology.

As they continue to refine their product and expand their partnerships, the vision is clear: to fundamentally change how heart disease is monitored and treated, reducing the incidence of hospitalizations and improving life quality for millions.

In a world where health technologies are evolving rapidly, Bodyport is making strides that promise to bring significant improvements to the lives of those with chronic heart issues. With their tagline, "One simple step to care for your heart," they remind us that health management can—and should—be as effortless as stepping on a scale.

For more information, visit [Bodyport’s website](http://bodyport.com).
